title: 1.7.2打不开
author: www.CF.com
txt_content:
新买了一个电脑，原来是笔记本电脑，现在想在这电脑上下载一个MC，后来发现点开启动器后打不开，java和路径都是对的，以下是logs里的（我看不懂，大大们帮忙看看呗）：[13:41:10] [main/INFO]: Setting user: YYL[13:41:10] [main/INFO]: (Session ID is token:${auth_access_token}:${auth_uuid})
[13:41:10] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.0
[13:41:11] [Client thread/ERROR]: Couldn't set pixel format
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:244) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at azd.Z(SourceFile:354) [1.7.2.jar:?]
        at azd.e(SourceFile:689) [1.7.2.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103) [1.7.2.jar:?]
==========================================分界线===============================================

[12:20:16] [main/INFO]: (Session ID is token:${auth_access_token}:${auth_uuid})
[12:20:17] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.0
[12:20:17] [Client thread/ERROR]: Couldn't set pixel format
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:244) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:306) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:848) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:757) ~[lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:?]
        at azd.Z(SourceFile:354) [1.7.2.jar:?]
        at azd.e(SourceFile:689) [1.7.2.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:103) [1.7.2.jar:?]
（你们是知道的，MC打不开是什么心情）
{:10_507:}

replies.author: Franz
replies.txt_content: 这个时间来逛论坛的会比较少= =         而且会看这个的人也不多= =         如果你用的java8看我签名的帖子或者换java7       如果不是我也不知道什么问题  慢慢等喽        晚上人才会多
